title: Decoded Quantum Interferometry (DQI) for MaxCut
subtitle: Solving the MaxCut Problem using the DQI Algorithm in the setting of max-XORSAT
description: Implementation of the Decoded Quantum Interferometry (DQI) algorithm for combinatorial optimization, focusing on max-LINSAT and its special case max-XORSAT. The notebook demonstrates DQI in the max-XORSAT setting using Classiq.
